attributes.action: Have a national vote on deciding lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
The people have a right for democracy, let us speak.
They are entitled to an opinion and what we as a nation is best for us.
We should be allowed to vote on how we should move forward from coronavirus.
As a community and as a nation we decided on our future.
I think it's very important that the government listens to the public and understands our needs.
attributes.background:
I want the government to hold a national vote on coronavirus (covid 19).
I want them to let the people speak.
When to end lockdown, how to move forward.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
